# Invitation to Tender 01B46-23-002: Fire Alarm Monitoring CEF (Surveillance des alarmes incendie FEC)

## Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** March 8, 2023, 14:00 (EDT)
* **Amendment Date:** March 6, 2023

## Project Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites eligible bidders to submit their tenders for the Fire Alarm Monitoring CEF project. The project involves the monitoring of AAFC's fire alarm systems, located on the Central Experimental Farm (CEF) site in Ottawa, on a 24/7 basis.

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be required to provide comprehensive monitoring services for AAFC's fire alarm systems, ensuring seamless communication between all systems and a central security center. The monitoring services will be provided on a 24-hour, 7-day-a-week basis.

## Tender Documents

Tender documents, including specifications, plans, and drawings, are available on the BuyandSell service provider's platform. Bidders are required to obtain all related documents through this platform. Addenda, when issued, will also be available on the platform.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* **Contract Officer:** Nicole LeBlanc
* **Email:** Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (506) 378-2956

## Important Notes

* Bidders must submit their tenders in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender documents.
* AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and to reject any or all proposals received.
* It is mandatory for bidders to obtain the related specifications, plans, and drawings, and all other tender documents through the BuyandSell service provider's platform.
